name: ECOGPerformanceStatusResults
title: ECOG Performance Status Results
description: As of 3/15/2018, value set entry date, other LOINC Normative Answers were not available in the VSAC, but were indicated to be applicable for LOINC 42800-3. These include: LA9622-7, LA9623-5, LA9624-3, LA9625-0, LA9626-8. Recommend continuing to see if these are added to the VSAC during value set maintenance.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts related to ECOG Performance Status results.),(Data Element Scope: This data element would be modeled using the 'Assessment' QDM category, and this value set used as an attribute.),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set contains LOINC Normative Answers.),(Exclusion Criteria: Other types of results of the ECOG Performance Status.)
